description: This 4 input x 2 output remote or manual control digital Optical Toslink audio Selector features active electronic circuitry for flawless and seamless switching and optimum light signal transfer of your digital Optical Toslink audio signals while maintaining signal integrity on long cable runs. Unlike the manual rotary optical audio switchers all over the internet which ultimately will degrade your digital audio signal. Connect up to four digital Optical Toslink sources such as DVD player, digital cable box, Blu-ray player etc, to the digital optical input of up to two separate digital audio processors like your home theater system, active speakers, amplifier, receiver etc. Select which one you'd like to hear via the credit card sized remote control or feather touch push buttons on front panel. May be placed vertically or horizontally and all cables are connected from the rear of the switch allowing for a neat cable installation. Supports all S/PDIF standards including compressed multi-channel Dolby 5.1, 7.1, Dolby Digital, AC-3, DTS as well as uncompressed LPCM/PCM audio formats with sampling rates up to 192kHz at 24-bit resolution. Features/Specs.. 4 input / 2 output digital optical toslink audio selector. Active circuitry for flawless, seamless switching. Active circuitry for optimum light signal transfer. Maintains signal integrity even on long cable runs. Will not degrade digital audio signal like passive manual switchers. Supports sampling rates at 32, 44.1, 48, 96 kHz and up to 192 kHz max. Supports 16/20-bit and up to 24-bit resolution. Source input selected via manual push buttons on front panel or remote control. Supports all S/PDIF standards including Dolby 5.1, Dolby Digital, DTS, LPCM/PCM audio formats. Powered by 9VDC (100-240VAC to 9VDC power adapter included with US, EU or AU plug). Removable stand, rubber anti skid feet on one side for horizontal placement. Dimensions; 5&1/2"H without stand, 5&3/4"H with stand X 7"L X 1&1/2"W.
title: 4x2 Remote Control Digital Optical TOSlink Audio Fiber Optic Selector Switch Switcher Splitter
